rules_text:
CBG05 Reoccuring Terror can't block.
[i]Finale [/i]– Whenever CBG05 Reoccuring Terror or another enchantment is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may exile a creature card from your graveyard. If you do return CBG05 Reoccuring Terror from your graveyard to your hand.
notes: Loops with a copy of itself, mana gate? Exile gate?
